result.eng: I had to use all my strength.
result.ga: Bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáid
result.orig: Bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáid
result.html: Bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáidI had to use all my strength.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí orm iomlán mo nirt a ċur in úsáidI had to use all my strength.
